title: Why does TFT not give you XP?
body: Every other game mode gives you XP.  With TFT, I'm making no progress in either honor or XP, and it feels pretty rough.  Why is this one particular game more different than every other game mode in this respect?

replies.body:
because it's not a game mode... it's a different game and should not be hosted on the server we have but on it's own server with it's own xp and rewards

only the champs used as ''pieces'' make it a LOL game... nothing else makes it have it's place in this client

this game is for braindead people who think they have any impact in a full random generated game, only need luck and one braincell, or a bot program!

while if you play lol well you need: skills, think and react fast, use 2 hands!, be awake( ive made it in top 3 being asleep or afk for 3+ consecutives round just spamming rr and buying anything randomly)

the game sucks the way riot is going with it sucks get this sht bugfest out of this server and put it in a trash can server like it deserves
toxic rat, full with people like you in ranked
It does give you xp I have gone from 163 to 166 playing TFT, the xp rates are low but you do get xp

It has nothing whatsoever to do with the actual game, so if someone leveled through TFT and then one day decided to play the real game, or in the worst case, Ranked, it would completely ruin the game.
